呝字的基本解释

呝
è
古同“呃”。

呝字的汉语字典释义

[①]［è］
亦作“呝1”。
(1)气逆作声。俗称打嗝。
(2)见“呃喔”、“呃呃”。
(3)见“呃嚱”。
[②]［ài］
［《廣韻》烏界切，去怪，影。］
(1)不平声。
(2)叹词。表示感叹、招呼、提醒等。

呝字的康熙字典解释

【丑集上】【口字部】　呝； 康熙笔画：8； 页码：页181第20
【廣韻】於革切【集韻】乙革切，?音戹。【說文】喔也。【玉篇】雞聲。亦作呃。　又【廣韻】呝喔，鳥聲。　又【集韻】烏懈切，音隘。聲不平謂之呝。或作?。○按《集韻》呝與《廣韻》呃，義雖同而音各異。《廣韻》呃在十六怪，《集韻》呝在十五卦，其實一字也。

呝字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
呝字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
Sigh
è
Gu Tong "Uh".
Sigh
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [è]
Also known as "呝1".
(1) Reversal of anger. Commonly known as hiccups.
(2) See "Uh oh" and "Uh oh".
(3) See "Uhhh".
[②]［ài］
["Guangyun" Wujie cut, go to blame, shadow. ]
(1) Uneven sound.
(2) Interjection. Express exclamation, greeting, reminder, etc.
Sigh
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chou Ji 1] [Words Department] 　呝; Kangxi strokes: 8; Page number: page 181-20
[Guang Yun] Yu Geqie [Jiyun] Yi Geqie,? Yinshu. [Said the text] Oh also. [Jade articles] The sound of chickens. Also for uh.　[Guangyun] again, the sound of birds.　 [Ji Yun] Wu lax cut, sound narrow. Unbalanced sound is called screaming. Or for?. ○According to "Ji Yun" and "Guang Yun", although the meaning is the same, the pronunciation is different. "Guangyun", er, is in the sixteen strangers, and "Jiyun" is in the fifteen hexagrams, in fact, there is one word.
